Verses: 1 indhak Kaariyangal Nadandhapinbu, Dhevan Aabiragaamai Sodhiththaar; Eppadiyenil, Avar Avanai Nokki: Aabiragaame Endraar; Avan: Idho Adiyen Endraan.

2 appozhudhu Avar: Un Puththiranum Un Ekasudhanum Un Nesakumaaranumaagiya Eesaakkai Nee Ippozhudhu Azhaiththukkondu, Moriyaa Dhesaththukkup Poi, Ange Naan Unakkuk Kurikkum Malaigal Ondrinmel Avanaith Thaganapaliyaaga Baliyidu Endraar.

3 aabiragaam Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Than Kazhudhaiyinmel Senankatti, Than Velaikkaararil Iranduperaiyum Than Kumaaran Eesaakkaiyum Koottikkondu, Thaganapalikkuk Kattaigalaiyum Pilandhukondu, Dhevan Thanakkuk Kuriththa Idaththirkup Purappattupponaan.
4 moondraam Naalil Aabiragaam Than Kangalai Ereduththup Paarththu, Dhooraththile Andha Idaththaik Kandaan.

5 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Than Velaikkaararai Nokki: Neengal Kazhudhaiyai Niruththi Inge Kaaththirungal, Naanum Pillaiyaandaanum Avvidamattum Poi, Thozhudhukondu, Ungalidaththukkuth Thirumbi Varuvom Endraan.
6 aabiragaam Thaganapalikkuk Kattaigalai Eduththu, Than Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkinmel Vaiththu, Than Kaiyile Neruppaiyum Kaththiyaiyum Eduththukkondaan; Iruvarum Koodipponaargal.

7 appozhudhu Eesaakku Than Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaamai Nokki: En Thagappane Endraan; Adharku Avan: En Magane, Idho, Irukkiren Endraan; Appozhudhu Avan: Idho, Neruppum Kattaiyum Irukkiradhu, Thaganapalikku Aattukkutti Enge Endraan.
8 adharku Aabiragaam: En Magane, Dhevan Thamakkuth Thaganapalikkaana Aattukkuttiyaip Paarththukkolvaar Endraan; Appuram Iruvarum Koodippoi,

9 dhevan Avanukku Solliyirundha Idaththukku Vandhaargal; Ange Aabiragaam Oru Balipeedaththai Undaakki, Kattaigalai Adukki, Than Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkaik Katti, Andha Balipeedaththil Adukkiya Kattaigalinmel Avanaik Kidaththinaan.
10 pinbu Aabiragaam Than Kumaaranai Vettumpadikkuth Than Kaiyai Neettik Kaththiyai Eduththaan.
11 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Vaanaththilirundhu, Aabiragaame, Aabiragaame Endru Kooppittaar; Avan: Idho, Adiyen Endraan.

12 appozhudhu Avar: Pillaiyaandaanmel Un Kaiyaip Podaadhe, Avanukku Ondrum Seyyaadhe; Nee Avanai Un Puththiran Endrum, Un Ekasudhan Endrum Paaraamal Enakkaaga Oppukkoduththapadiyinaal Nee Dhevanukku Bayappadugiravan Endru Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkiren Endraar.

13 aabiragaam Than Kangalai Ereduththup Paarkkumpodhu, Idho, Pinnaagap Pudharile Than Kombugal Sikkikkondirundha Oru Aattukkadaavaik Kandaan; Appozhudhu Aabiragaam Poi, Kadaavaippidiththu, Adhaith Than Kumaaranukkup Padhilaagath Thaganabaliyittaan.
14 aabiragaam Andha Idaththukku Yekovaayeere Endru Perittaan; Adhinaale Karththarudaiya Parvadhaththile Paarththukkollappadum Endru Innaalvaraikkum Sollappattu Varugiradhu.
15 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Irandaandharam Vaanaththilirundhu Aabiragaamaik Kooppittu:
16 nee Un Puththiran Endrum, Un Ekasudhan Endrum Paaraamal Avanai Oppukkoduththu Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhapadiyaal;

17 naan Unnai Aaseervadhikkave Aaseervadhiththu, Un Sandhadhiyai Vaanaththin Natchaththirangalaip Polavum, Kadarkarai Manalaippolavum Perugave Perugap Pannuven Endrum, Un Sandhadhiyaar Thangal Saththurukkalin Vaasalgalai Sudhandhariththukkolluvaargal Endrum,
18 nee En Sollukkuk Keezhppadindhapadiyinaal, Un Sandhadhikkul Boomiyilulla Sagala Jaadhigalum Aaseervadhikkappadum Endrum Enperil Aanaiyitten Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
19 aabiragaam Than Velaikkaararidaththukkuth Thirumbi Vandhaan; Avargal Ezhundhu Purappattu, Egamaaip Peyersebaavukkup Ponaargal; Aabiragaam Peyersebaavile Kudiyirundhaan.
20 indhak Kaariyangal Nadandhapinbu, Oruvan Aabiragaamidaththil Vandhu: Milkkaalum Un Sagodharanaagiya Naakorukkup Pillaigalaip Petraal;
21 avargal Yaarendraal, Mudharperaana Oodhs, Avan Thambiyaagiya Poos, Aaraamukkuth Thagappanaagiya Kemuvel,
22 kesedh, Aaso, Pildhaas, Idhlaap, Peththuvel Enbavargal; Peththuvel Rebekkaalaip Petraan Endru Ariviththaan.
23 andha Ettupperai Milkkaal Aabiragaamudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Naakorukkup Petraal.
24 reyumaal Endru Perkonda Avanudaiya Marumanaiyaattiyum, Thepaa, Kaagaam, Thaagaas, Maagaa Enbavargalaip Petraal.
